resources.string: Single-player quiz session. Try to answer as many questions as you can correctly! Requires that Wikipedia data has been loaded.
Host a bluetooth quiz session, or join a hosted session. Hosting requires that Wikipedia data has been loaded.
Load quiz data from Wikipedia. Once this data has been downloaded, quizzes can be played offline.
Host a new multiplayer quiz session.
Search for host sessions to join.
Scroll through the loaded database to prepare for your next quiz!
